name: Repair Tools
description: The Blacksmith's tools are getting dull and need maintenance. He needs some materials to repair them.

objectives.description: Collect 1 Sharpening Stone for tool maintenance

dialogue.offer: My tools are getting dull from all the work. Could you help me gather some materials to repair them?
dialogue.accept: Great! I need a good sharpening stone for my tools and a couple of mushrooms to make tool oil.
dialogue.progress: Still looking for those materials? A sharpening stone and mushrooms - that's all I need.
dialogue.complete: Perfect! These will keep my tools in top condition. Here's something for your trouble.
dialogue.completed: Thanks to you, my tools are working perfectly again!
